comment_reply_grateful.text: Thank you so much for watching and taking the time to comment! ğŸ™ Your support truly means the world to me. Don't forget to subscribe and hit the notification bell so you don't miss any new videos!

comment_reply_educational.text: Great question! I'm so glad you asked. Let me expand on that point... This is actually something many of our viewers want to understand better. Check out my video [INSERT VIDEO] where I dive deeper into this topic.

comment_reply_promotional.text: I love that you're interested in this! If you enjoyed this video, you'll absolutely love my series on [RELATED TOPIC]. Check it out - I think it will really help you on your journey.

comment_reply_engagement.text: That's such a meaningful comment! I'd love to know more - what was your biggest takeaway from this video? How are you planning to apply these principles in your life?
